Administering security

Storage Advisor comes with a default local user that has permissions for all operations in Storage Advisor.

On a regular basis, you can change the password of the local user by accessing Change Local Password in Settings in the top navigation menu.

If you want to provide more granular control to your users, you can use role-based access to control the operations that can be managed by different users. To do so, you must first add your LDAP server as the source of authentication. Storage Advisor supports adding one external LDAP server.

You can then assign Storage Advisor roles to user groups that exist in the Active Directory account domain. Members of the user groups will use the assigned user roles, and therefore, only the privileges attached to those user roles.

  • Assigning user roles
